statements: DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 100 AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE comment_id = 100 AND user_id = 1;
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE post_id = 500 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;

DELETE FROM user_comments WHERE user_id = 1 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
